Texts.Chs: 请在基因提取器里尝试使用各种植物种子，因为每个种子都会产生不同的基因。经过大量的实验，才有可能找到你最需要的基因！
Texts.Eng: Effectively every plant seed can be placed within this lab, and each one will produce different genes. You'll need to experiment to find the ones you need the most! Start with basic plants, and work up from there.

Texts.Chs: 为什么你看上去如此慌张？是因为不会使用建造出来的基因提取器？别担心，其实使用方法很简单：放入一个马铃薯种子，并等待约五秒钟。你就会得到一个有用的基因了。
Texts.Eng: So you've built a ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset;? Why are you looking so clueless? It's simple: Toss in ^orange;a potato seed^reset; and wait about 5 seconds. You'll get a useful ^orange;gene type^reset; for your research.
